channel.title: RPGuilds - The Ultimate Fantasy Roleplay Experience!
channel.description:
[b][b][b][b][b][b]RPGUILDS[/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b] - the ultimate fantasy role play experience. Anyone can join and experience everything we have to offer as we have no white list! We have friendly & helpful staff that will always be there when you need them most. Here you can make friends easily and bring your own without hassle, team up and try to become Emperor of ALDERON. Server IP: RPGuilds.nn.pe:25575 Don't forget to visit our website for more information @ http://www.freewebs.com/rpguilds/
RPGuilds will introduce new players to roleplay we are the guiding step opening up a world of imagination and making those players who have not experienced roleplay see why other players do it and why we find it one of the best game genres around.
There are currently 40 player slots but become premium and you can join, even if the server is full!
